name: Dice Hero (wolewd, tidakjelas92, Hirue)
description:
Submitted for GMTK Game Jam 2022

Theme: Roll of the Dice

You play as a character named "Dice hero", trapped in a dungeon filled with evil monsters. You can use a sword to fight. Stay alive and find a way out of the dungeon.

Game controls:

Move FrontWMove Left
AMove BackSMove RightDAttackMouse Left ClickToggle Pause MenuEscape

The team behind this game:

  • Hansen - Game Programmer
  • Robert - Game Designer, 2D Artist, Animator
  • William - Game Designer, Sound Designer
